description: '''Thelonious Monster''' is an American [[punk rock]] band from [[Los Angeles]], [[California]], led by singer-songwriter [[Bob Forrest]] and named after jazz musician [[Thelonious Monk]]. Active from 1984 to 1994, again from 2004 to 2011, and reforming a second time in 2019, the band has released five original studio albums. The band has a large [[cult following]] and is considered to be a seminal and influential band in the 1980s L.A. underground music scene, alongside acts like [[Jane's Addiction]] and [[Red Hot Chili Peppers]]. They've been described as having "traced emotional dips and bends with exceptional acuity and impact".
